title: 'Changes' has come and gone. It was a bland and unmemorable album. Will Justin Bieber fade away from here on? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi. So.. first of all ..i dont like justin. But i do like some of his old stuff…i mean hater or not everyone likes at least one song..However his new album was not it…like was just worthless…all the songs sounded the same…i didnt even listen to some of the songs for more than 15 seconds..i was like alright next…and ended up regreting for wasting my time on it. Not to mention that some of the songs were unreleased tracks from 2013 ..(just changed a bit) wich were inspired by selena gomez..and not his wife..which he claims so much. Even though the album was a huge flop…jb is/was a big artist for a long time and i dont think he will fade away that fast The media is all up his ass.. he is even going on tour so a lot of people will start to grow interest on him again ( atleast 10% of his fanbase) So justin is not fading away…not completely..not yet…but for sure will never be as big as he was during purpuse.
His music is garbage, his presentation ridiculous, and his appeal to millions of listeners lunacy.
